name: Totally Not Space Invaders (The4R1O)
description:
If you can please send me your feedback : https://forms.gle/Y7nEsEQJi8NXJrqC6

Controls: 

Move: WASD, Arrow, Left Stick.

Shoot: LMB, Space, A or X on Joystick

Shield : E , Left Alt, B or Circle Joystick

Inspired by Chicken Invaders and Asteroid, the very first games I played on my pc back in 2004-05. I wanted to make my version of those games.

Pixel Art -  Gustavo Vituri

Music and Sound Effect - Kenney (www.kenney.nl)
